thread.title: Parkland survivors, up close and personal

title: Parkland survivors, up close and personal
text:
Parkland survivors, up close and personal 12:43pm GMT - 02:09 
The rally for gun control “needed to happen some way or another. I hate how it happened…but we need to make good out of it,” Parkland survivor Diego Pfeiffer told Reuters ahead of Washington’s March For Our Lives. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The rally for gun control “needed to happen some way or another. I hate how it happened…but we need to make good out of it,” Parkland survivor Diego Pfeiffer told Reuters ahead of Washington’s March For Our Lives.
